summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; authorizing grant of an easement for road purposes to Burlington Northern Inc. across City land in the northwest 1/4 of the Southeast 1/4 of Section 19, Township 21 North, Range 11 East, W.M., and authorizing as consideration therefor the acceptance of an easement for road purposes across Burlington Northern Inc. Land in the Northeast 1/4 of the Southwest Quarter of Section 15, Township 21 North, Range 9 East, W.M.
